title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4003.7 - Financial reports to be filed
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4003.7 - Financial reports to be filed

State Regulations

Each racing association shall furnish to the
commission within 60 days after the close of the fiscal year of such
association, three copies of such association's balance sheet and of such
association's operating statement for such fiscal year, with comparison to
prior year, the same to be duly sworn to before a notary public by the
treasurer or the assistant treasurer, or certified by a duly licensed certified
public accountant, and to be in such form as may be prescribed by the
commission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4003.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
